item.title: Minneapolis ICE shooting live updates: Subpoenas served to Gov. Walz, Mayor Frey
item.description: Grand jury subpoenas were served Tuesday to Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz, Minneapolis Mayor Jacob Frey, and other state officials.

item.title: WATCH: Brutal arctic blast wreaks havoc in Midwest before heading to Northeast
item.description: A brutal arctic blast is bringing dangerously low temperatures to the Plains and Midwest before it invades the Northeast.
